text.div:
Antiviral eligibility - when symptoms started codes

https://standards.digital.health.nz/ns/antiviral-eligibility-when-symptoms-started-codes

Terms for clinicians to identify when symptoms started to determine if a person is eligible for the COVID-19 antiviral

name: AntiviralEligibilityWhenSymptomsStartedCodes
title: Antiviral eligibility - when symptoms started codes
description: Terms for clinicians to identify when symptoms started to determine if a person is eligible for the COVID-19 antiviral

concept.display: Within the last 5 days (if considering nirmatrelvir with ritonavir or molnupiravir)
Within the last 7 days (if considering remdesivir)
More than 5 days ago if assessing for nirmaltrelvir with ritonavir; and molnupiravir, OR more than 7 days ago if assessing for remdesivir
